DelegatedPermissions.Name: LicenseManager.AccessAsUser
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the application to impersonate the signed-in user when communicating with the M365 License Manager service.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Application.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals on your behalf. Does not allow management of consent grants.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: AppRoleAssignment.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: AuditLog.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and query your audit log activities, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: BitlockerKey.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read BitLocker keys for your owned devices. Allows read of the recovery key.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Channel.Create
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Create channels in any team, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Channel.Delete.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Delete channels in any team, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Channel.ReadBasic.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Read channel names and channel descriptions, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ChannelMember.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Read the members of channels, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ChannelMember.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Add and remove members from channels, on your behalf. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ChannelMessage.Edit
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to edit channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ChannelMessage.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read a channel's messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ChannelMessage.Send
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to send channel messages in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ChannelSettings.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ChannelSettings.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ConsentRequest.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read consent requests and approvals, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: DelegatedAdminRelationship.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to manage (create-update-terminate) Delegated Admin relationships with customers and role assignments to security groups for active Delegated Admin relationships on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: DelegatedPermissionGrant.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to manage permission grants for delegated permissions exposed by any API (including Microsoft Graph), on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Device.Command
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to launch another app or communicate with another app on a device that you own.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Device.Read
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to see your list of devices.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Device.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read devices' configuration information on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: DeviceLocalCredential.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read device local credential properties including passwords, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementApps.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.PrivilegedOperations.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune. Does not allow high impact operations such as remote wipe and password reset on the device’s owner.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementRBAC.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Directory.AccessAsUser.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to have the same access to information in your work or school directory as you do.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Directory.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as other users, groups.  It does not allow the app to delete users or groups, or reset user passwords.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Domain.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read all domain properties on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Group.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create groups and read all group properties and memberships on your behalf.  Additionally allows the app to manage your groups and to update group content for groups you are a member of.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: GroupMember.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of your groups. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: IdentityRiskEvent.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and update identity risk event information for all users in your organization on your behalf. Update operations include confirming risk event detections.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: IdentityRiskyServicePrincipal.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and update identity risky service principal information for all service principals in your organization, on your behalf. Update operations include dismissing risky service principals.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: IdentityRiskyUser.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and update identity risky user information for all users in your organization on your behalf. Update operations include dismissing risky users.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Mail.Send
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to send mail as you.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Mail.Send.Shared
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to send mail as you or on-behalf of someone else.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: MailboxSettings.ReadWrite
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete your mailbox settings.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Member.Read.Hidden
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups or administrative units on your behalf, for those hidden groups or adminstrative units that you have access to.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: offline_access
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to see and update the data you gave it access to, even when you are not currently using the app. This does not give the app any additional permissions.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: openid
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows you to sign in to the app with your work or school account and allows the app to read your basic profile information.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Organization.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, on your behalf. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: OrgSettings-Forms.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write organization-wide Microsoft Forms settings on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: PeopleSettings.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the application to read and write tenant-wide people settings on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Place.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to manage organization places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Policy.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read your organization's policies on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.ApplicationConfiguration
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies on your behalf.  This includes policies such as activityBasedTimeoutPolicy, claimsMappingPolicy, homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy, tokenIssuancePolicy  and tokenLifetimePolicy.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationFlows
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the authentication flow policies for your tenant, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationMethod
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the authentication method policies for your tenant, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.Authorization
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's authorization policy on your behalf. For example, authorization policies can control some of the permissions that the out-of-the-box user role has by default.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.ConditionalAccess
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.ConsentRequest
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's consent request policy on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.DeviceConfiguration
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's device configuration policies on your behalf.  For example, device registration policy can limit initial provisioning controls using quota restrictions, additional authentication and authorization checks.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.MobilityManagement
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's mobility management policies on your behalf.  For example, a mobility management policy can set the enrollment scope for a given mobility management application.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: PrivilegedAccess.Read.AzureResources
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of Azure resources (like your subscriptions, resource groups, storage, compute) on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureResources
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of user privileges to manage  your Azure resources (like your subscriptions, resource groups, storage, compute) on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: profile
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to see your basic profile (e.g., name, picture, user name, email address)

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Reports.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows an app to read all service usage reports on your behalf. Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ReportSettings.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and update admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Directory
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and manage the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, on your behalf. This includes instantiating directory roles and managing directory role membership, and reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: SecurityActions.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and update security actions, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: SecurityEvents.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security events on your behalf. Also allows you to update editable properties in security events.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: SecurityIncident.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write to all security incidents that you have access to.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ServiceHealth.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read your tenant's service health information on your behalf.Health information may include service issues or service health overviews.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ServiceMessage.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages on your behalf. Messages may include information about new or changed features.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: SharePointTenantSettings.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the application to read and change the tenant-level settings of SharePoint and OneDrive on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Sites.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allow the application to edit or delete documents and list items in all site collections on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Team.Create
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create teams on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Team.ReadBasic.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Read the names and  descriptions of teams, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: TeamMember.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Add and remove members from teams, on your behalf. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: TeamMember.ReadWriteNonOwnerRole.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Add and remove members from all teams, on your behalf. Does not allow adding or removing a member with the owner role. Additionally, does not allow the app to elevate an existing member to the owner role.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: TeamsActivity.Read
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read your teamwork activity feed.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: TeamSettings.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Read all teams' settings, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: TeamSettings.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Read and change all teams' settings, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: TeamsTab.Create
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: TeamsTab.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: ThreatAssessment.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests on your behalf. Also allows the app to create new requests to assess threats received by your organization on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: UnifiedGroupMember.Read.AsGuest
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read basic unified group properties, memberships and owners of the group you are a member of.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: User.ManageIdentities.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read, update and delete identities that are associated with a user's account that you have access to. This controls the identities users can sign-in with.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: User.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.Read.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users you have access to in your organization. Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your authentication methods, including phone numbers and Authenticator app settings.This does not allow the app to see secret information like your passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use your authentication methods.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: TeamsTelephoneNumber.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and modify your tenant's acquired telephone number details on behalf of the signed-in admin user. Acquired telephone numbers may include attributes related to assigned object, emergency location, network site, etc.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write authentication methods of all users you have access to in your organization.                       Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow                      the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Application.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals without a signed-in user.  Does not allow management of consent grants.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: AuditLog.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and query your audit log activities, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: AuditLogsQuery.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and query audit logs from all services.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Channel.Create
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Create channels in any team, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Channel.ReadBasic.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Read all channel names and channel descriptions, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: ChannelMember.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Read the members of all channels, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: ChannelMember.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Add and remove members from all channels, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: CrossTenantInformation.ReadBasic.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the application to obtain basic tenant information about another target tenant within the Azure AD ecosystem without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Device.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write all device properties without a signed in user.  Does not allow device creation, device deletion or update of device alternative security identifiers.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementApps.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.PrivilegedOperations.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementManagedDevices.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user. Does not allow high impact operations such as remote wipe and password reset on the device’s owner

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementRBAC.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementRBAC.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementScripts.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune device compliance scripts, device management scripts, device shell scripts, device custom attribute shell scripts and device health scripts, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: DeviceManagementServiceConfig.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Directory.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Directory.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups, without a signed-in user.  Does not allow user or group deletion.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Domain.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read all domain properties without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Files.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete all files in all site collections without a signed in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Group.Create
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create groups without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Group.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read group properties and memberships, and read conversations for all groups, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Group.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create groups, read all group properties and memberships, update group properties and memberships, and delete groups. Also allows the app to read and write conversations. All of these operations can be performed by the app without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: GroupMember.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of the groups this app has access to without a signed-in user. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: InformationProtectionPolicy.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows an app to read published sensitivity labels and label policy settings for the entire organization or a specific user, without a signed in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: MailboxSettings.ReadWrite
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Organization.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: OrgSettings-Forms.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write organization-wide Microsoft Forms settings, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: PeopleSettings.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the application to read and write tenant-wide people settings without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Place.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Policy.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read all your organization's policies without a signed in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.ApplicationConfiguration
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies, without a signed-in user.  This includes policies such as activityBasedTimeoutPolicy, claimsMappingPolicy, homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy, tokenIssuancePolicy  and tokenLifetimePolicy.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationFlows
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write all authentication flow policies for the tenant, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.AuthenticationMethod
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write all authentication method policies for the tenant, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.ConditionalAccess
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.ConsentRequest
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's consent requests policy without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Policy.ReadWrite.CrossTenantAccess
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write your organization's cross tenant access policies without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureADGroup
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups in your organization, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Reports.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows an app to read all service usage reports without a signed-in user.  Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: ReportSettings.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and update all admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Exchange
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and manage the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your organization's Exchange Online service, without a signed-in user. This includes reading, creating, updating, and deleting Exchange management role definitions, role groups, role group membership, role assignments, management scopes, and role assignment policies.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: SecurityAnalyzedMessage.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Read email metadata and security detection details, and execute remediation actions like deleting an email, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: SecurityEvents.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read your organization’s security events without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: SecurityIncident.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read all security incidents, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: SecurityIncident.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and write to all security incidents, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: SharePointTenantSettings.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the application to read and change the tenant-level settings of SharePoint and OneDrive, without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Sites.FullControl.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections without a signed in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: TeamMember.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Add and remove members from all teams, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a team member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: TeamMember.ReadWriteNonOwnerRole.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Add and remove members from all teams, without a signed-in user. Does not allow adding or removing a member with the owner role. Additionally, does not allow the app to elevate an existing member to the owner role.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: User.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read and update user profiles without a signed in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: TeamsTelephoneNumber.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read your tenant's acquired telephone number details, without a signed-in user. Acquired telephone numbers may include attributes related to assigned object, emergency location, network site, etc.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the application to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user.                       Authentication methods include things like a user’s phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This                      does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods

DelegatedPermissions.Name: user_impersonation
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allow the application to access Partner Center on your behalf

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Exchange.Manage
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to manage your organization's Exchange environment, such as mailboxes, groups, and other configuration objects. To enable management actions, an admin must assign you the appropriate roles.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Calendars.ReadWrite.All
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete events in all calendars in your organization you have permissions to access. This includes delegate and shared calendars.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: MailboxSettings.ReadWrite
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete your mailbox settings.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Exchange.ManageAsApp
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to manage the organization's Exchange environment without any user interaction. This includes mailboxes, groups, and other configuration objects. To enable management actions, an admin must assign the appropriate roles directly to the app.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Calendars.ReadWrite.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

ApplicationPermissions.Name: MailboxSettings.ReadWrite
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: AllSites.FullControl
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections on your behalf.

DelegatedPermissions.Name: AllProfiles.Manage
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Manually added

DisplayName: Skype and Teams Tenant Admin API

DelegatedPermissions.Name: user_impersonation
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Access Microsoft Teams and Skype for Business data based on the user's role membership

DelegatedPermissions.Name: Vulnerability.Read
DelegatedPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read Threat and Vulnerability Management vulnerability information on behalf of the signed-in user

ApplicationPermissions.Name: Vulnerability.Read.All
ApplicationPermissions.Description: Allows the app to read any Threat and Vulnerability Management vulnerability information
